## Reading the data 


```{r read the data}
df_name <- "case_data_all_ng_16-21.csv"
df <- read.csv(sprintf("C:\\Users\\gpitt\\Documents\\Phd\\visiting\\Individual effects on reserving\\%s",df_name),header=T)
```


```{r}
df<- df %>%
  mutate(CM=AM+DM-1)

prova <- IndividualData(data = df,
                        categorical_features = c("Claim_type_key","Cover_key"),
                        continuous_features = NULL,
                        accident_period="AM",
                        calendar_period="CM",
                        years=7 #check this. I see strange development periods
                        )
```
